channel.title: Why does it do this to me?
channel.description:
Dont know if this might be posted already but i searched couldnt find so here it goes.
How do i stop firefox from deleteing all my bookmarked pages? and everything?
It deleted all my stuff omg wtf im mad.
Also i got my smf forum working. ownage and how do i fix this [img]http://www.picvault.info/images/537009730_problem.jpg[/img]
Edit: Does anyone have the stuff to get full version of style xp?
